page.title: 07 EVENTS IN SAPPERTON
page.content: On Saturday July 6th the parents of our School organised a fete and a barbecue to raise money so that we can go to the Slimbridge Wildfowl Trust next Spring. There was something for everybody. For the tinies Lady Denny brought her donkeys for them to ride on. Paddington Bear taught the bigger ones songs. It was really a lady dressed up as a bear. For the ones older still there was an assault course with a tank of water . For much older ones there were mini motor bikes. All around the field there were stalls, skittles and darts and games for everyone. My Mum sold icecreams. We raised Â£160.17 and had a lovely time. by Fenn Gascoigne.
